articles.title: Not Ruturaj Or Bishnoi! Ashish Nehra Names 26-Year-Old Star As India's Standout Performer vs Australia - Times Now
articles.description: Ashish Nehra was named India's standout performer in the 4-1 series win over Australia in the recently concluded five-match T20I series. Nehra did not pick Player of the Series (POTS) Ravi Bishnoi, who was the leading wicket-taker in the series, and Ruturaj G…
articles.content: Not Suryakumar Yadav! Ex-World Cup Winner Names T20 Star As Potential Middle Order Mainstay For India In ODIs
